name: Gin and Waffles 3: Luftwaffle
description:
#GMTK - Joined Together! With her Waffle cart!
Controls: Arrow Keys + Spacebar

OwOt is this? Ginny is walking around freely?
No jumprope tied to her legs, or stumbling into a cart?!
This is going to be an amazing day!

But where are the waffles? Oh no! 
Evil space bunnies have taken the world's waffle supply 
and we need to get them back, every scrumptious yummy one of 'em!

So quickly Ginny jumps into her cart and takes to the sky
To save the world and bring back as many waffles as she can
From the clutches of the evil space rabbits!

Tell us your delicious ultimate highscores in the comments ♥

For those curious "3rd? Was there a 1 and 2?"
Gin and Waffles 1 and 2 can be found ~Here~ Which was our very first gamejam, submitted for GMTK 2018 - "GENRE, but you can’t MECHANIC" and 2020 - "Out of Control"
